description: Teaches you how to permanently enchant a melee weapon to often inflict a curse on the target, inflicting Shadow damage and reducing their melee damage. Cannot be applied to items higher than level 600.
name: Formula: Enchant Weapon - Unholy

spell.name: Unholy Weapon
spell.description: Permanently enchant a melee weapon to often inflict a curse on the target, inflicting Shadow damage and reducing their melee damage. Cannot be applied to items higher than level 600.
